scripts.build: vue-tsc && vite build && call build\before_build.bat&& electron-builder --config build\ultra-build.json&&call build\after_build.bat
scripts.build:ultra: call build\ultra_before_build.bat&&vue-tsc && vite build && electron-builder --config build\ultra-build.json&&call build\after_build.bat
scripts.dir:ultra: call build\ultra_before_build.bat&&vue-tsc && vite build && electron-builder --dir --config build\ultra-build.json&&call build\after_build.bat
scripts.build:arc: vue-tsc && vite build && call build\arc_before_build.bat&& electron-builder --config build\arc-build.json&&call build\after_build.bat
